node.excerpt: Gridsome  is Vue flavoured and a powerful static site generator. It’s the Gatsby alternative for Vue. It is data-driven meaning it uses a GraphQL layer to get data and dynamically update pages from it. Features of Gridsome Fast by default ⚡️ It’s PWA…
